description: Erection of box dormer above existing two-storey rear outrigger.
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall provide two swift boxes close to the eaves prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such in perpetuity.</p><p>REASON: In the interest of biodiversity</p>

<p>The window in the side elevation of the extension at second floor level shall be obscure-glazed and non-openable up to 1.7 metres from floor level.</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: To ensure the proposed development does not detrimentally impact the amenity enjoyed by neighbouring residents.</p>

<p>All new external facing and roofing materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.</p><p><br></p><p>

REASON: To ensure the proposed development complements the original design of the host property and does not detract from the character of the surrounding area.</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
